title: Anyone can tell me how to transfer account to other server?
body:
Hi, I will leave NZ next year so wanna transfer my account to Japanese Server, but I dont know how to do it, and also I didnt find anything that I can purchase in the game's store that can do it for me.

Anyone have some idea 'bout it? Cheers. :)

replies.body:
(~~You have to be in the Legacy Client before you try~~ I think it's fixed now), Go into the store and go to the account settings (should be on the top right "Person and a Gear"), there should be something about "transfer" I am unsure and unable to check cause I'm on my phone right now.

Anyway if you still need help feel free to add me on League and I'll help you to the best of my ability If we are both online.
Thx for ur reply, but in the "Account", I can only find a "Summoner Name Change".
